name: Olaplex No.3 Hair Perfector
description: A treatment that strengthens hair and reduces breakage, suitable for all hair types.

name: Kérastase Resistance Bain Force Architecte Shampoo
description: Reconstructing shampoo for brittle, damaged hair. Strengthens and revitalizes hair fibers.

name: Shiseido Fino Premium Touch Hair Mask
description: Intensive hair mask that deeply moisturizes and repairs damaged hair.

name: Olaplex No.4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo
description: A restorative shampoo that repairs and protects hair bonds for healthy, shiny hair.

name: Kérastase Discipline Fluidissime Anti-Frizz Spray
description: Anti-frizz spray that provides shine and control while protecting against humidity.

name: Shiseido Tsubaki Premium Repair Hair Mask
description: Repairing hair mask enriched with tsubaki oil to nourish and strengthen hair.

name: Olaplex No.5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner
description: A conditioner that hydrates and repairs hair, leaving it strong, smooth, and shiny.

name: Kérastase Nutritive Nectar Thermique Heat Protector
description: Heat-activated leave-in treatment for dry hair. Nourishes, protects, and adds shine.

name: Shiseido Super Mild Hair Treatment
description: Gentle hair treatment that conditions and detangles, suitable for sensitive scalps.

name: Fino Premium Touch Hair Treatment Essence
description: Leave-in hair treatment essence that moisturizes and smoothens hair for a silky finish.
